meanings.sent1: She limbered up before the race by stretching her muscles.
meanings.sent2: He limbered his fingers before playing the piano.
meanings.sent3: The robot limbered its joints before starting its dance routine.
meanings.sent4: The old door creaked as if it had been limbered after years of being stuck.
meanings.sent5: The gymnast limbered her body, ready to perform a perfect routine.

meanings.sent1: The yoga instructor demonstrated a limbered pose to the class.
meanings.sent2: The cat's limbered movements allowed it to easily climb the tree.
meanings.sent3: The limbered tree branches swayed gracefully in the wind.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was as limbered as a gymnast's body, able to adapt to any situation.
meanings.sent5: The dancer's limbered body moved with fluidity and grace on stage.
